label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_013
content:
## 2024-05-27 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 101
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 28
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 6

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 34
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 36

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.3
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 33.4
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.4
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 330.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 39.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 25.4
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.5
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.9

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.2
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 43.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.3
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 297.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 56.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.4
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.6
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.3
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.6
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.6
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 46.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.1
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 273.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 41.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.7
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.7
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.4

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 210
- Sessions Attended: 172
- Attendance Rate (%): 84.0

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.6
- WBC (K) SD: 1.4
- Platelets (K) Mean: 251
- Platelets (K) SD: 49
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.84
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.19
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 101.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1328, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1396, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1314, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1311, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-1338, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 91%
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 14 sites

### Notes
- Week 13: Pain management assessments on track. 107 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
